open.title: Vumatel Reach Outage | Moroka
open.description: Vumatel Reach has informed us of a network outage affecting Moroka, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Vumatel Reach engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: Technicians are on site busy with repairs

open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

open.title: FibreSuburb Maintenance | Western Cape
open.description: FibreSuburb is conducting maintenance in Western Cape on the 12th July 2025 from 20:00 to 21:00, users affected will experience limited to no connectivity during the maintenance window. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

closed.title: Afrihost Fibre Outage | Western Cape
closed.description: We are investigating reports of affecting some clients on our CG-NAT environment of the Afrihost network. We are working on identifying and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.
